content_html: Bhairahawa (Rupandehi), Sept 12: A peace and goodwill rally has been held in Bhairahawa with the aim of promoting peace and harmony in the country. Through this rally organized by various organisations in coordination with the Lumbini Press Club, a call has been made to restore peace in the aftermath of the Gen Z mov
